vsParam:
Uh, [px].
The thing I asked of you earlier, are you done with it...

Mmm... But, Anis, I must tell you again,
this medicine is very strong, don't drink too much, okay?

Thanks for your concern.
Don't worry, I'll keep it in mind...

Hmm, I knew it.
[px], sorry, we can't take this medicine.

Sorel!?
What... are you doing here!?

We grew up together, you can't hide anything from me.
I can see that you are up to something stupid, so I came.

Anis doesn't need to train her body,
so she doesn't need that medicine.

It's not something stupid!
Don't say anything if you don't know, Sorel!

You are the one who knows nothing, Anis!
Why don't you talk to me first!

Are we childhood friends?
We grew up together, why don't you tell me about that!

How... how could I say it! Because...
because I want to become someone like Sorel!

You are sunny, Sorel! But I am the opposite,
I am always slow and I can't manage anything!

Anis, you are way better than me.
I know that... you have many shining points.

You are clever, knowledgeable and can always keep calm...
and you have a gentle and quiet character...

You can easily do things that I can never manage.
I respect you from the bottom of my heart.

So, Anis. You don't have to make any change.
You are already... excellent enough.

How is it possible... I only bring trouble to everyone,
that's why I want to be useful to you guys!

Fool... Nobody thinks you are useless.
Because we are all Anis' friends.

We can trust on our friends, right?
No matter how weak you are... They'd never abandon you.

Listen to me... If you feel uncomfortable relying on others...
You can rely on me solely.

I can't do that...
Sorel, you are...

You can... No matter what, I'll accept you.
We are best friends.

We've been together since childhood, I know all your strengths
and weaknesses... You are the most important friend to me.

Er, I am sorry...
It's been a long time since I cried like that...

I am too anxious.
I always feel that everyone will abandon me...

But I'll try not to think about it.
Because you guys are my... "friends".

That's right!
We can rely on each other, that's called "friends"!
We are also quite dependent on Anis.
Just rely on me, I don't mind!

Uh, my best friend is the one causing the most troubles.
But I guess that's what makes Anis so kawaii♪

What? I, I am... not kawaii!
Sorel, don't talk like that... Hehe.

Hehe... Ha ha ha ha!
Alright... We should go back to our rooms now.

Ah, right. Sorry to take up your time
for so long, [px].

You made medicine for me, I'll pay you back someday.
Please excuse us now...

So the episode comes to an conclusion, huh?
Hehe, "the best friends"...

Hehe, friends are the best,
what do you think, [px]?
